title: SAHM Week: Motherhood In The 2020's
description:
In Praise of Stay-At-Home Moms Week: Elizabeth feels pressured by the feminist lifestyles that contradict her belief system as a stay-at-home mom. - Dr. Laura: "You get to design your life."

Do you feel pressured to dump your kid in daycare? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura’s book: “In Praise of Stay-At-Home Moms” go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-in-praise-of-stay-at-home-moms

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
